data.text: @sciencecohen that people might say, ‘We still think it actually came from the handler of that red fox,’” Worobey says." But isn't that what @MichaelWorobey himself did in his Science letter, which rejected the strongest possible evidence reported by Shi Zhengli against a lab leak?

@sciencecohen "“With the way that people have been able to just push aside any and all evidence that points away from a lab leak, I do fear that even if there were evidence from one of these samples that was full of red fox DNA and SARS-CoV-2 ...
@sciencecohen Are you being paid for spreading misinformation?

@sciencecohen This article is flawed and should be removed! It is garbage and unscientific because the inputs (Chinese CDC record of COVID cases) were fabricated by intentionally required the epic-link to market. garbage- in-garbage -out. Read the thread to find why. https://t.co/QsQzyEqhxh
